com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.broadcast

Interface WOWZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WOWZBroadcastAPI.AudioBroadcaster, WOWZBroadcastAPI.VideoBroadcaster, WOWZSinkAPI.AudioSink, WOWZSinkAPI.MediaCodecAudioSink, WOWZSinkAPI.MediaCodecVideoSink, WOWZSinkAPI.StreamingAudioSink, WOWZSinkAPI.StreamingVideoSink, WOWZSinkAPI.VideoSink
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WOWZAudioDevice, WOWZCameraView, WOWZGLBroadcaster, WOWZH264Broadcaster, WOWZMP4Broadcaster, WOWZMP4Writer
    Enclosing class:
    WOWZBroadcastAPI

    public static interface WOWZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster
    The Broadcaster interface defines the methods that must be implemented by classes developed as broadcast components with instances registered with an instance of the WOWZBroadcast class via an instance of the WOWZBroadcastConfig class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WOWZBroadcastConfig getBroadcastConfig()
      Gets the configuration settings for an active broadcast session.
      com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.support.status.WOWZStatus getBroadcasterStatus()
      Gets the status for a broadcast component.
      com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.support.status.WOWZStatus getStatus()
      Deprecated. 
      Use getBroadcasterStatus() instead.
      com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.support.status.WOWZStatus prepareForBroadcast(WOWZBroadcastConfig broadcastConfig)
      Initializes each component of a broadcast.
      com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.support.status.WOWZStatus startBroadcasting()
      Called on each broadcast component to begin a live streaming broadcast.
      com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.support.status.WOWZStatus stopBroadcasting()
      Called on each broadcast component to end a live streaming broadcast.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareForBroadcast

        com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.support.status.WOWZStatus prepareForBroadcast(WOWZBroadcastConfig broadcastConfig)
        Initializes each component of a broadcast. Upon successful initialization, each component must set its status to WOWZState.READY or WOWZState.IDLE and also indicate the error in the status.
        Parameters:
        broadcastConfig - The broadcast configuration.
        Returns:
        The status after transitioning each broadcast component to WOWZState.READY.

      • getBroadcastConfig

        WOWZBroadcastConfig getBroadcastConfig()
        Gets the configuration settings for an active broadcast session. Only returns a non-null value between calls to prepareForBroadcast() and stopBroadcasting().
        Returns:
        The configuration settings for the active broadcast session or the broadcast session currently being prepared.

      • startBroadcasting

        com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.support.status.WOWZStatus startBroadcasting()
        Called on each broadcast component to begin a live streaming broadcast. Upon success, each component must set its status to WOWZState.RUNNING or WOWZState.IDLE and also indicate the error in the status.
        Returns:
        The status after transitioning each broadcast component to WOWZState.RUNNING.

      • stopBroadcasting

        com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.support.status.WOWZStatus stopBroadcasting()
        Called on each broadcast component to end a live streaming broadcast. Upon success, each component must set its status to WOWZState.IDLE.
        Returns:
        The status after transitioning each broadcast component to WOWZState.IDLE.

      • getBroadcasterStatus

        com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.support.status.WOWZStatus getBroadcasterStatus()
        Gets the status for a broadcast component.

      • getStatus

        com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.support.status.WOWZStatus getStatus()
        Deprecated. Use getBroadcasterStatus() instead.
